549250.name: Fantasy Grounds - Mini-Dungeon #008: Carrionholme (5E)
549250.description:
A 5E Mini-Dungeon for 4-5 PCs of Levels 4-5

Home to a coven of three green hags, who call themselves the Daughters of the Morass. Fervent followers of Jubilex, they have bound a number of slimes and oozes to their service, mainly to protect their home. From their sunken home near the centre of the swamp, which they have named Carrionholme, they attack and raid nearby communities of all races as they arent fussy who they consume. The more barbaric races local tribes of goblins, lizardmen and kobolds hold these evil sisters in awe and offer up sacrifices of the weak and traitors, whilst the small communities of humans and elves that live in and around the swamp live in constant fear of their attacks.
5E Mini-Dungeons are small adventures for 5th Edition which are setting agnostic and are easily inserted anywhere in your campaign.
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Anthony Rush
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
